notes:
This dataset contains the integrated phase classification (IPC) for September 2016, and livelihood zones for Haiti, extracted to each administrative level 3 unit (sections).    It also contains the population for each admin 3 unit based on WorldPop (2015 v2b UN adjusted). 

Source datasets:

* [IPC and Livelihoods](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/fews-net-food-security-outlook-june-2016-to-jan-2017-for-lac-includes-ht-priority-area)
* [Administrative Boundaries](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/hti-polbndl-adm1-cnigs-zip) (version released 6-Oct-2016)
